name: Day of Resistance: Moment of Shattered Dreams
title: Day of Resistance: Moment of Shattered Dreams
desc: Victorious were we who fought to be free... Thus did the dream of eternal prosperity fall with this mighty capital...

skills.desc:
During this Round, your targeted character takes -1 DMG. (Max 4 times)
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
